game.name: Papa’s Pastaria
game.description:
One of the best cooking games right from the Papa Louie restaurant management series, Papa Pastaria is extremely popular among girls from different age groups. Known as the 9th game in this series, this exclusively-designed online activity features an awesome restaurant. Developed by Flipline Studios, this cool game is set in the town of Portallini, the hometown of the Romano Family.

When you play this newest range of free cooking game, you get a chance to become a Portallini primo pasta chef in Papa Pastaria restaurant. It has converted into a destination wedding right in the waterfront town of Portallini. In Papa newest restaurant, you as a player have to take charge of it while taking care of plenty of things, including taking orders, cooking noodles, as well as adding toppings and sauces to cook an ideal plate of pasta.

In this latest flash game, customers have a chance to select either to wait in line for their delivery or enjoy their orders while being seated properly in the dining room. You as a player have an opportunity to hire the services of a second worker (Doan, Utah or a second Custom Worker) for completing the job like taking orders from their customers who are sitting in the dining room. One of the best cooking games that you have ever seen, this game includes four stations, including Order Station, Cook Station, Build Station and Bread Station.

Working for Papa Pastaria is not all catching fly balls. All you need to do is make your customers feel happy while taking and serving their orders. Do your job honestly to collect the best possible tips!
